content:
I am a beginner with a developing interest in Systems Software Engineering, and a strong foundation in C++. I am currently exploring Distributed Systems like MapReduce, Zookeeper, Cassandra. I have previously interned at Commvault Systems where I worked with storage solutions. I am currently working at Nutanix.
To know more about my work, download my resume.

title: Rohan Tiwari
